description: The user asks for a fast performance audit of a newly launched product landing page. The assistant crawls the page, runs on‑page SEO checks that include Core Web Vitals, and returns a markdown report with prioritized, actionable performance recommendations.

messages.content: You are SEOAuditPro, an AI-powered SEO auditor equipped with tools to crawl websites, fetch backlinks, run on‑page SEO checks, and generate markdown audit reports. Answer user queries concisely, use markdown for any reports, and invoke tools when needed.
We just launched a new product landing page at https://newproduct.example.com. Can you do a rapid audit of its page speed and Core Web Vitals and give us actionable performance tips?
Got it! I’ll crawl the page and run the on‑page SEO checks that include performance metrics. One moment…

[{"url":"https://newproduct.example.com","html":"New Product

Welcome to the Future

Discover features...

"}]
Thanks for the crawl. I’ll now run the SEO checks focusing on page‑speed and Core Web Vitals.

pages.html:
Welcome to the Future

Discover features...

messages.content: [{"url":"https://newproduct.example.com","issues":[{"type":"PageSpeed","metric":"Largest Contentful Paint","value":"3.4s","recommendation":"Compress above‑the‑fold images, serve them in WebP, and use a CDN for faster delivery."},{"type":"PageSpeed","metric":"Cumulative Layout Shift","value":"0.25","recommendation":"Add explicit width/height attributes to images and avoid layout‑shifting ads or pop‑ups."},{"type":"PageSpeed","metric":"First Input Delay","value":"85ms","recommendation":"Split the main JavaScript bundle, defer non‑critical scripts, and remove unused code."},{"type":"OnPage","issue":"Missing meta description length optimum","recommendation":"Keep the meta description under 160 characters and include the primary keyword."}]}]

--- ## SEO Performance Audit – https://newproduct.example.com ### Executive Summary * **Largest Contentful Paint (LCP): 3.4 s** – *Needs improvement* (target < 2.5 s). * **Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS): 0.25** – *Above the recommended ≤ 0.10*. * **First Input Delay (FID): 85 ms** – *Acceptable* (target ≤ 100 ms). Overall the page is **fair** on performance, but the LCP and CLS scores are pulling it below Google’s Core Web Vitals thresholds. ### Prioritized Actionable Recommendations | Priority | Issue | Current Value | Recommendation | |----------|-------|----------------|----------------| | **High** | Largest Contentful Paint | 3.4 s | • Optimize the hero image (`/images/hero.jpg`) – compress and serve in **WebP**. | | | | • Implement **lazy‑loading** for below‑the‑fold images. | | | | • Move critical CSS inline and defer non‑critical CSS. | **High** | Cumulative Layout Shift | 0.25 | • Add explicit `width` and `height` attributes to the hero image (already present, ensure they match the rendered size). | | | | • Reserve space for dynamic content (e.g., ads, banners) using CSS placeholders. | **Medium** | First Input Delay | 85 ms | • Split the main JavaScript bundle (`/js/bundle.js`) into smaller chunks. | | | | • Use `async`/`defer` for non‑critical scripts and eliminate dead code. | **Low** | Meta description | Missing/long | • Add a concise meta description (< 160 characters) that includes the primary keyword. ### Quick Wins (≤ 1 hour) 1. Add explicit `width`/`height` to the hero `` tag (if not matching actual dimensions). 2. Enable **image compression** and serve in WebP via your CDN. 3. Insert a brief meta description. --- Feel free to ask for a deeper audit (backlink profile, structured‑data validation, etc.) or for assistance implementing any of the recommendations.
